column1: '''Chica Baggins, née Chubb''', was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].
Chica was the daughter of the head of the Chubb family. As her family name would have become lost after her marriage to [[Bingo Baggins]], her offspring received a double surname,<ref>{{L
column3: Falco]] was the first to bear that name.<ref>{{App
